Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/3fb9b99cca390e8ac5838c03363c46a99396e463 for binaries and test log.\n

I suppose we should declare fRequestShutdown as volatile, as a sufficiently smart compiler will decide to move this statement out of the loop, as it doesn't depend on the loop invariants in any way (not expecting other threads to modify it).\n
